'''Secret Source Automatons''' are an enemy group found in [[Natlan]].

Strange machines from a time long past, these automatons are generally found in an idle state.

In battle, the Secret Source Automaton will react to [[Nightsoul's Blessing]]; after its respective meter is filled, the automaton will counter with a more powerful attack, lowering its RES to all attacks in the process. 

In the case of the boss, the RES decrease will only occur when the attack is interrupted, and it is also stunned for the effect's duration.
